an8.65:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these eight dimensions of mastery.
an8.65:4.3: Perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:4.4: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:4.5: This is the first dimension of mastery.
an8.65:5.1: Perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:5.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:5.3: This is the second dimension of mastery.
an8.65:6.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:6.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:6.3: This is the third dimension of mastery.
an8.65:7.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly.
an8.65:7.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:7.3: This is the fourth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:8.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, blue, with blue color, blue hue, and blue tint.
an8.65:8.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:8.3: This is the fifth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:9.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, yellow, yellow colored, yellow in appearance, shining yellow.
an8.65:9.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:9.3: This is the sixth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:10.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, red, red colored, red in appearance, shining red.
an8.65:10.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:10.3: This is the seventh dimension of mastery.
an8.65:11.1: Not perceiving form internally, someone sees visions externally, white, white colored, white in appearance, shining white.
an8.65:11.2: Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’
an8.65:11.3: This is the eighth dimension of mastery.
an8.65:11.4: These are the eight dimensions of mastery.”
